ApplyMaterialIfMissing(RhinoObject, RhinoDoc, int)

Applies a material to the given object if it does not already have one.

public static void ApplyMaterialIfMissing(RhinoObject rhObj, RhinoDoc doc, int materialIndex)

Parameters

rhObj RhinoObject

Rhino object to modify.

doc RhinoDoc

Active Rhino document.

materialIndex int

Index of the material to assign.

SelectMaterial(RhinoDoc)

Displays a Rhino UI prompt allowing the user to choose a material. Creates a default material when none exist.

public static int SelectMaterial(RhinoDoc doc)
